title: zestVI
author: zestVI
content: title says alli need someone to take a selfie with what instagram requiresits not a scam or anything i just want a verified account to scroll through and they keep blocking me

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: Do you not have a face to take a selfie yourself? You’re implying it’s not a scam but very reluctant to verify the account yourself. I also wonder why you keep getting blocked? Do you have other things in mind than just scrolling through?I doubt you would get any favorable response but then again, I think you know that already.

comments.author: zestVI

I also wonder why you keep getting blocked? Do you have other things in mind than just scrolling through?I doubt you would get any favorable response but then again, I think you know that already. your coment is wasting my time you either sell your selfie to me or you dont no need for comment farming

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: Quote from: zestVI on November 03, 2022, 07:11:41 PMQuote from: Iroh on November 02, 2022, 07:12:58 PMDo you not have a face to take a selfie yourself? You’re implying it’s not a scam but very reluctant to verify the account yourself. I also wonder why you keep getting blocked? Do you have other things in mind than just scrolling through?I doubt you would get any favorable response but then again, I think you know that already. your coment is wasting my time you either sell your selfie to me or you dont no need for comment farmingI’m sorry if pointing out that you’re probably a fraudulent person trying to carry out a fraudulent scheme is comment farming to you. And I’m glad my comment helped out in wasting your precious time. Hopefully this comment would chip in as well.
